imdb.plot outline: The story has Justice LN Thakur essayed by Anang Desai, his wife Mamta played by Supriya Pilgaonkar, and their five eccentric daughters: Anji (Sara Afreen Khan), Binni (Shilpa Raizada), Daboo (Sukirti Kandpal), Chandi (Monica Sharma), and Eshu (Meera Deosthale). The hero, Dylan Singh Shekhawat, is played by actor Aamir Ali. Famous for their shenanigans and popular with the boy brigade, each of the Thakur girls has her own style, personality and charm.
imdb.title: Dilli Wali Thakur Gurls
plot: The show is set against the backdrop of Delhi and the story revolves around five siblings who are alphabetically named and very different from each other.

The story has Justice LN Thakur essayed by Anang Desai, his wife Mamta played by Supriya Pilgaonkar, and their five eccentric daughters: Anji (Sara Afreen Khan), Binni (Shilpa Raizada), Daboo (Sukirti Kandpal), Chandi (Monica Sharma), and Eshu (Meera Deosthale). The hero, Dylan Singh Shekhawat, is played by actor Aamir Ali. Famous for their shenanigans and popular with the boy brigade, each of the Thakur girls has her own style, personality and charm.
